name: Dracula's Dungeon
description:
You are Dracula. Humans have taken over your castle! You need to take it back.

Look for keys to open barricades, navigate the castle, and AVOID HUMANS. They all reek of garlic.

INSTRUCTIONS:

A , D to move

W to jump

Other things to note:

- There IS music.

- Play Fullscreen!

-Every jump is possible.
